name: 'Sweet Little Lies' Dress
description:
Got curves? ROCK CURVES.

A cowl neck is magical. It enhances all bust sizes big or small, and rouching hides and plethora of sins! We LOVE this dress. 

Our model is completely un-airbrushed. She is an 8-10 in the bust and 12-14 in the hips. She has killer curves and THIS is how to rock them! If you are an hour glass, cello, skittle or even pear, this dress will work for you. If you are larger but perfectly in proportion, it will give you sexy back. Add a hip or waist belt for extra confidence. It does wonders! Add firming 'booty shorts' to disguise lumpy bums, and be 'ass confident' Or, even better, wear our 3/4 shape wear leggings for a full thigh, tummy, bum lift. I do, and I'm an 8-10. 

LOVE YOUR BODY! Love your boobs, butt and sexy bits. Add a cardi if you can't conjure up confidence, but we know if you wear this dress and hold your head high, shoulders back, you will receive the compliments you deserve. 

YOU GO GIRL.

Sizing is forgiving in this dress, 
S-M fits 10-14
M-L fits 12-18

name: 'Life Song' Black Aline Singlet
description:
Life Song has and is our story. It goes like this:

First bar feature the rune for 'breakthrough' which symbolises our birth. It's kinda messy, but there's love. We fly through our youth (plane) with any luck (black cat!)

Second bar: We discover our power. The night life. We unleash our inner animal and things can get messy again.

Third bar: We work, work, work for money and somehow time (clock) seems to fly away (raven) until we reach the end of this journey, (fourth bar) where we start the next with all those we've loved along the way. (That's what I like to think anyway!)

As for the shape, it is a simple, forgiving, aline, airy singlet top made from gorgeous fabric that is 100% Sweatshop free?

Well, here you go :)

Made from our classic breathable, natural rayon jersey with just a touch of lycra it will keep you cool and is machine washable, non-iron requiring, easy care.

S-M fits 6-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 14-18

name: Mini Draped Dress - Black
description:
'Ah Me!' Is how you will feel in the slinky dress, draped from the shoulder to cover the tummy. Reminiscent of 50s Hollywood glamor in a very current style we LOVE this dress on its own, or worn with our classic bum-firming leggings. Belt it, rouche it into a top or just slide into it and go!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16

name: 'Life Song' White Aline Singlet
description:
Life Song has  and is our story. It goes like this:

First bar feature the rune for 'breakthrough' which symbolises our birth. It's kinda messy, but there's love. We fly through our youth (plane)  with any luck (black cat!)

S-M fits 6-12 
M-L fits 12-16 
L-XL fits 14-18

name: 'Moon Rabbit' Royal Blue Aysm Tank
description:
Once in a blue moon something special comes along... something quiet, romantic, peaceful, comfortable and forgiving and this describes both the top AND the print.

This asym tank looks easy and fabulous with everything, from jeans to our shape wear skirts, shorts or leggings. It has an aline shape, flow and drape that is just so easy to wear.

S-M fits 8-14 
L-XL fits 14-20

name: 'Gold Canary' Black V-Neck
description:
Gold Canary is the song of freedom sung from the tree tops! Proving to be the best seller of the season, this classic top is awesome with our red skirts. 

Made to flatter this top has a lovely drop from the bust to just below the hip. If ever you are have a really-not-feeling-all-that-slim day, this with leggings and flats will do the trick. V neck are particularly excellent for larger busted women to prevent visually elongating the boobers.

Just saying here, but if you are a large size and like this top, don't think too long. 

S-M fits 8-10 
M-L fits 12-14 
L-XL fits 14-16

We use a natural stretch jersey fiber with 5% spandex. This gives our clothing a beautiful, drape, comfort and flexibility in sizing.

name: 'Come Fly With Me'- Aline Black Dress
description:
As the winds of a new season lift your spirits, put on your wings and come fly with me!! This is a classic Wildseed piece of simplicity. Fitted up top and flaring out at the bottom with an asymmetrical hemline it is designed to flatter. The length is just below the knee at the front on most women and mid calf at the back. Dress it up, with classy heels, belt and cropped cardi or dress it down with thongs, either way you have no to go in under 5 minutes!

S-M fits 6-10 
M-L fits 10-14 
L-XL fits 12-16

name: 'Cloud Nine' Aline Sky Blue Dress
description:
So the name describes the dress. Throw it on and go! This was a print that was dictated by the garment. The dress is sky blue and was crying for clouds!

This is a classic Wildseed piece of simplicity. Fitted up top and flaring out at the bottom with an asymmetrical hemline it is designed to flatter. The length is just below the knee at the front on most women and mid calf at the back. Dress it up, with classy heels, belt and cropped cardi or dress it down with thongs, either way you have no to go in under 5 minutes!

S-M fits 6-10
M-L fits 10-14
L-XL fits 12-16

name: 'Moon Rabbit' Black Asym Tank
description:
Once in a blue moon something special comes along... something quiet, romantic, peaceful, comfortable and forgiving and this describes both the top AND the print.

This asym tank looks easy and fabulous with everything, from jeans to our shape wear skirts, shorts or leggings. It has an aline shape, flow and drape that is just so easy to wear.

S-M fits 8-14
L-XL fits 14-20

name: Animal Print Shapewear Skirt
description:
Rrrrrrrrow!!! Embrace your inner wild thing with the cotton lycra wardrobe staple. Made from our signature heavy cotton lycra that is cooler than denim and yet holds in all the bits AND the bobs. 

The roll top means you can adjust this skirt to suit any outfit and does not cut in creating muffin top. You can wear unrolled on the hip for maximum length (just below the knee, depending on your height) rolled down for just above the knee or high waisted to team with a crop or simply to keep your tummy pulled in and kidneys warm. You can layer it, or wear it on its own with a simple top.
The cut is slightly A-line at the bottom which allows for comfort and movement. It is made from great quality rayon lycra which means it will give you comfortable wear for years to come.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14

name: Aqua Green Shape Wear Skirt
description:
This colour is fresh fresh fresh! It talks to the other colours in your spring wardrobe and should slot in like a dream.

Made from our signature heavy cotton lycra that is cooler than denim and yet holds in all the bits AND the bobs.

The roll top means you can adjust this skirt to suit any outfit and does not cut in creating muffin top. You can wear unrolled on the hip for maximum length (just below the knee, depending on your height) rolled down for just above the knee or high waisted to team with a crop or simply to keep your tummy pulled in and kidneys warm. You can layer it, or wear it on its own with a simple top.
The cut is slightly A-line at the bottom which allows for comfort and movement. It is made from great quality rayon lycra which means it will give you comfortable wear for years to come.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14

name: 'Ladder to the Stars' Tie tee
description:
Let's into those stars! May image may inspire you! We love the touch of gold comet here, it really pops. :)

A classic Wildseed top, have fun dressing this piece up, with one of our little black skirts and a blazer and you're off to work, or team with jeans and thongs and you're off to a barbie.

It's slightly a-line in cut so will fall from the bust to cover any extra little bits you may prefer to not highlight, to put it delicately.

The tie at the top is adjustable for different width shoulders and to prevent the shoulders slipping down and the dipped hem gives a little discretion to the, ahem, rear angle.

Wear it confidence!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 16-18

Made from our high quality, naturally breathable rayon jersey to the highest of standards, this is a great little top for forever wear!

name: 'Maiden Hair' Tie Tee
description:
Hair of the maiden.... a fickle fern to grow, but a delightful pattern to print! 

A classic Wildseed top, have fun dressing this piece up, with one of our little black skirts and a blazer and you're off to work, or team with jeans and thongs and you're off to a barbie. 

It's slightly a-line in cut so will fall from the bust to cover any extra little bits you may prefer to not highlight, to put it delicately.

The tie at the top is adjustable for different width shoulders and to prevent the shoulders slipping down and the dipped hem gives a little discretion to the, ahem, rear angle. 

Wear it confidence!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14

Made from our high quality, naturally breathable rayon jersey to the highest of standards, this is a great little top for forever wear!

name: Stripe Aline Singlet
description:
Simple, forgiving, aline, airy and fabulous this singlet top is so easy to wear. Team it with one of our skirts or leggings and away you go. Best of all it's made from soft durable fabric 100% Sweatshop free. This top is puuuuurfect for the warm summer days and nights ahead!

Made from our classic breathable, natural rayon jersey with just a touch of lycra it will keep you cool and is machine washable, non-iron requiring, easy care.

S-M fits 6-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 14-18

name: Rainbow Daisy Aline Singlet
description:
So, you want a simple, forgiving, aline, airy singlet top made from gorgeous fabric that is 100% Sweatshop free?
 
Well, here you go. :)

Featuring a new colour version of one of Wildseed's latest top selling prints this top is puuuuurfect for the warm summer days and nights ahead!

Made from our classic breathable, natural rayon jersey with just a touch of lycra it will keep you cool and is machine washable, non-iron requiring, easy care. 

S-M fits 6-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 14-18

name: 'My Heart is in Your Hands' Cobalt Blue Hanky Hem Singlet
description:
Colour trend alert! Who cares what the trend is, this colour looks fabulous on everyone. ;) 

Made from cotton supema this top is soft, light and very durable. The hanky hem shape does wonders for hiding hips and thighs and is generally slimming on every body type. Wear it with leggings or our straight skirts.

Cold machine wash, no tumble dry, and this top will love you forever.

Sizing:
S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fit 14-18

name: 'To Dream is Key' Hanky Hem Top
description:
Officially the first time Wildseed has featured a word in a print! But it's not just any word. It's the word that is the key to your life, success, love and aspirations... 

Made from cotton supema this top is soft, light and very durable. The hanky hem shape does wonders for hiding hips and thighs and is generally slimming on every body type. Wear it with leggings or our straight skirts.

Cold machine wash, no tumble dry, and this top will love you forever.

Sizing:
S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fit 14-18

name: 'She Sells Sea Shells' V Neck Top
description:
Summer means sea side sand castles and looking for treasure in the dunes! Well, we found some treasure for you to wear always!

Made to flatter this top has a lovely drop from the bust to just below the hip. If ever you are have a really-not-feeling-all-that-slim day, this with leggings and flats will do the trick. V neck are particularly excellent for larger busted women to prevent visually elongating the boobers.

Just saying here, but if you are a large size and like this top, don't think too long. It's selling FAST.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 14-16

We use a natural stretch jersey fiber with 5% spandex. This gives our clothing a beautiful, drape, comfort and flexibility in sizing.

name: 'Wishful' Purple V-Neck Top
description:
We all feel a little wishful sometimes, so make one! 

Made to flatter this top has a lovely drop from the bust to just below the hip. If ever you are have a really-not-feeling-all-that-slim day, this with leggings and flats will do the trick.

The fabric is a lovely draping rayon lycra, in a lovely rich purple colour. 

Just saying here, but if you are a large size and like this top, don't think too long. It's selling FAST.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 14-16

name: Reversible Long Sleeve- Purple
description:
So simple, it's genius, these long sleeves are the ideal weight for the in between summer/autumn and cooler summer nights when you need a layer to throw on that's comfy, cool and classy.

Featuring a lovely slightly aline cut in the body, slight boat neck and mandatory thumb holes in the sleeves they are a natural fiber staple made to go for years!

We love the contrasting stitching. Love that if you spill a little something on it, while you're out, you can turn it inside out and no one would ever know! 

Available in three colours, and three sizes, get in quick!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14
L-XL fits 12-16

name: Reversible Long Sleeve- Grey
description:
So simple, it's genius, these long sleeves are the ideal weight for the in between summer/autumn and cooler summer nights when you need a layer to throw on that's comfy, cool and classy.

name: Dragonfly Tie Top Dress- Blue
description:
The classic dragonfly print returns!

This beautiful straight cut dress can be rouched up to cover any lumps and bumps. To eliminate wobbly bums and give a tummy tuck try this dress with our shape wear 3/4 leggings! Confidence in a two piece outfit.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: Dragonfly Tie Top Dress- Black
description:
The classic dragonfly print returns!

This beautiful straight cut dress can be rouched up to cover any lumps and bumps. To eliminate wobbly bums and give a tummy tuck try this dress with our shape wear 3/4 leggings! Confidence in a two piece outfit.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: 'Silver Dollar' 100% BAMBOO Cowl Neck Singlet
description:
'Silver Dollar' is a lovely organic print, teamed with the common cabbage moth it speaks of the richness in nature. This is the semi translucent seeds of the Honesty Plant... all symbols we love!

Bamboo jersey is amazing to touch. Against the skin it feels like silk but lets the skin breathe in a way that makes silk envious. 

This is a straight cut top, not too fitted but not aline either. It is an excellent piece to tuck into anything high waisted. 

*Wash with care for better longevity! A delicates cycle, bag or hand wash recommended to extend the life of this stunning fabric.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14

name: 'Hatchling' Easy cut reverse stripe tee
description:
'Hatchling' was inspired by the turtle of Bali who still lay their babies on some of the busiest beaches. The locals have rallied to save the little eggs from dogs and those who would cook them as a delicacy (!!)  and release them into the sea once they have hatched.

This is a relaxed cut and fit tee, easy to wear made sweatshop free from cotton and rayon, both natural fibers. As alway, these tees are limited edition!

One size fits 8 to small 14.

name: Reversible Split Skirt- Red/Coral
description:
Inspired by this yummy reversible fabric this playful piece can be worn around 8 ways.

-Split to the side
-Split to the front
-Split to the back
-As a bandeau dress

Times by two for each colour!

The split is framed by fabric in lush drape. As you move about the is enough fabric to cover your leg and if your leg is exposed the split opens to a couple of inches above the knee.

The top of the skirt has thin elastic and can be rolled or not. The length of the skirt is maxi, to the ankle. The fabric is rayon jersey and rayon slub for the light shade.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14, will stretch to a size larger.

name: White & Grey Aline Dress
description:
A'hoy Summer! Hand me my sandals, I'm ready to go! 

This is a classic Wildseed piece of simplicity. Fitted up top and flaring out at the bottom with an asymmetrical hemline it is designed to flatter. The length is just below the knee at the front on most women and mid calf at the back. Dress it up, with classy heels, belt and cropped cardi or dress it down with thongs, either way you have no to go in under 5 minutes!

S-M fits 6-10
M-L fits 10-14
L-XL fits 12-16

*This is a firm striped rayon lycra fabric with a lot of stretch but a little smaller in cut.

name: Speckled Draped Dress- Light Grey & Black
description:
This floaty draped dress is a gorgeous piece for any occasion. It highlights and disguises all the right spots. Unique, striking and ultimately comfortable it you have some tummy thigh or butt issues you will love this dress and it will love you!

In the style of a simple wrap dress underneath, then zips up and ties at the back. 

The fabric is a soft against the skin, does not require ironing and it machine washable.

The sizing is forgiving due to the wrap and tie back factors. 

MADE WITH LOVE!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 16-20

name: Speckled Draped Dress- White and Black
description:
This floaty draped dress is a gorgeous piece for any occasion. It highlights and disguises all the right spots. Unique, striking and ultimately comfortable it you have some tummy thigh or butt issues you will love this dress and it will love you!

In the style of a simple wrap dress underneath, then zips up and ties at the back.

The fabric is a soft against the skin, does not require ironing and it machine washable.

The sizing is forgiving due to the wrap and tie back factors.

MADE WITH LOVE!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 16-20

name: 'Come Out to Play' Cap Sleeve Grey & White Stripe Top
description:
Come out! Come out! Come out to play! It's SPRING!

This was a childish playful print to bring out your inner pirate/punk/rock chick! That way you can drink rum at 9am and no one can say a word.

Research has proven horizontal stripes to be flattering. They accentuate the bust and show the slim bit under. The cotton is lovely to wear and breathable, but isn't as super stretchy as the usual rayon/cotton lycra that we use, but does have a little 'give'.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14

name: Shapewear Cotton Lycra Tube skirt- Black
description:
This skirt is an absolute staple of the wardrobe and is bound to be worn again and again!

The roll top means you can adjust this skirt to suit any outfit and does not cut in creating muffin top. You can wear unrolled on the hip for maximum length (just below the knee, depending on your height) rolled down for just above the knee or high waisted to team with a crop or simply to keep your tummy pulled in and kidneys warm. You can layer it, or wear it on its own with a simple top.
The cut is slightly A-line at the bottom which allows for comfort and movement. It is made from great quality rayon lycra which means it will give you comfortable wear for years to come.

Due to the roll top this is fantastic maternity wear.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 14-16

name: 'Love is a Battlefield' Printed Leggings- Green
description:
Love is a battlefield when you're hand printing leggings, four times per piece, front and back! For this reason these are strictly limited edition funky tights!

Made from soft forest green rayon lycra add a little somethin' somethin' to your outfit. Dress up plain dresses or layer with skirts. Or throw on a longer style top and away you go!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: 'Love is a Battlefield' Printed Leggings
description:
Love is a battlefield when you're hand printing leggings, four times per piece, front and back! For this reason these are strictly limited edition funky tights!

Made from sparkly black rayon lycra add a little somethin' somethin' to your outfit. Dress up plain dresses or layer with skirts. Or throw on a longer style top and away you go!

name: 'Of A Feather' Cap Sleeve Cotton Basic Dress
description:
Terracotta cotton lycra with a gradient print, 'Of a Feather' is a lovely, abstract print.

We learned that placement of the print across the tummy attracts the eye to the print and not what is under it and love how it works in this dress!

Made from easy to wear cotton lycra that is soft, comfortable and machine washable this is an easy to wear basic.

The cut is straight at the top, and should be a snug fit, while the skirt is slightly aline.

If you feel you need a tummy tuck to wear this, we have those too! Check out our shape wear leggings.

This is a great piece, a Wildseed staple.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: Black & Grey Stripe Cap Sleeve Cotton Basic Dress
description:
Made from soft knitted cotton that is breathable, comfortable and machine washable this is an easy to wear basic.

The cut is straight at the top, and should be a snug fit, while the skirt is slightly aline.

If you feel you need a tummy tuck to wear this, we have those too! Check out our shape wear leggings.

This is a great piece, a Wildseed staple.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-12

name: 'Loves Me Not, LOVES ME!' Cap Sleeve Dress
description:
Does anyone else receive geraniums in their bouquets? Than you are LOVED! 

You will also love the clever placement of the flower and petals across the tummy attracting the eye to the print and not what is under it.

Made from easy to wear cotton lycra that is soft, comfortable and machine washable this is an easy to wear basic. 

The cut is straight at the top, and should be a snug fit, while the skirt is slightly aline. 

If you feel you need a tummy tuck to wear this, we have those too! Check out our shape wear leggings. 

This is a great piece, a Wildseed staple.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: 'Come Out to Play' Cap Sleeve Black & White Stripe Top
description:
Come out! Come out! Come out to play! It's SPRING!

This was a childish playful print to bring out your inner pirate/punk/rock chick! That way you can drink rum at 9am and no one can say a word. 

Research has proven horizontal stripes to be flattering. They accentuate the bust and show the slim bit under. The cotton is lovely to wear and breathable, but isn't as super stretchy as the usual rayon/cotton lycra that we use, but does have a little 'give'.

S-M fits 8-10
M-L fits 10-12
L-XL fits 12-14

name: 'Mate For Life' Reverse Stripe Tee
description:
Did you know that seahorses are monogamous? ...And the males carry the babies? Isn't that romantic?! 

We love little beauties of nature and this tee is one of them! It is a relaxed cut and fit, can be worn in the summer or teamed with long sleeves under for winter. 

Limited edition and one of our best sellers get in fast before they sell out!

S-M fits 8 to small 14.

name: 'Petals in My Pocket' Dress
description:
This dress will really grow on you! Ha! See that? I made a little joke... 

But seriously. The beauty of this dress is no joke. A gorgeous paneled A-Line pocketed flowing number is simply lovely. In the cooler moths team it with a long sleeve underneath (...hey, we have those!) with leggings boots and a lovely jacket. 

We love A-line shapes. They frame the good bits and hide any other bits as if there's not other bits at all! Plus black suits everyone and is instantly slimming.

Hand printed in Melbourne and sweatshop free. What more could you want?

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16

name: 'Dragonfly' Asym Raw Edge Raglan Sweater
description:
Another timeless Wildseed classic print! 

Made from 100% french terry cotton this winter sweater has a little 'Flash Dance' appeal to it, which we do so love!

The raw edged scooped neck and hem line gives a little industrial, earthy appeal with our classic a-line asymmetrical long at the back (to keep your butt warm) cut. this makes it relaxed, comfortable and warm.

It features a slight a-line cut on the body which works so well on all shapes and best of all? It has thumb holes to hook through when you need to warm your little hands.

As stated, the sizing is generous.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 14-16

name: Shapewear Leggings
description:
**Photo coming soon!**

These are NOT your average leggings! They are made from high grade thick rayon lycra which is both warm and breathable. They hold in any wobbly bits and give your lower half fantastic form. With a wide elastic band at the top which gives you a virtual tummy tuck you visibly lose about 2kg, I'm not kidding! I don't know any women, big or small who don't want that! If you have met me at a market of late, chances are I've been wearing these amazing leggings for all these reasons. 

COME INTO MY WORLD! 

IMPORTANT sizing info: 
S-M fits 6-8
M-L fits 8-10
L-XL fits 12-14
XXL fits 14-16
XXXL fits 16-18

name: 'Love in my Pocket' Jumper Dress- Black
description:
This is one of those excellent 'throw me on and go!' dresses. Long sleeves and leggings under, chuck on this and a jacket, and you're ready. It's warm and snuggly with deep pockets that feature a 'maker's mark of sorts. Look for the love in the thumb print...

Made from 100% cotton french terry 'hoody' fabric there is no ironing required here. The cut is very forgiving if you have lumps and bumps, but can be dressed up beautifully with a belt. Team with a cropped tailored or swing jacket to give interesting proportions. The best thing about this dress is, it's not hard... it's easy. Which is what Wildseed loves to be. :)

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-16
L-XL fits 14-18

description:
Here is a classic piece for work, night or day attire.

With a 'less is more' approach to print, our aim was to not interrupt the gentle curves that frame the bust and face.

Made from our yummy rayon lycra this top has stretch and drape in all the right places.

Also available in red wine.

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 10-14

name: Coral 100% Rayon Drape Vest
description:
Need a piece to Brighten basics? Here it is!

This is a free size top, and it really it. It looks fabulous on a small, nd even better on a larger lady. Just adjust the shoulder width. Now on sale at an irresistible price and amazing quality to boot, there are four colours to choose from!

Enjoy!

One size fits from 8-20 due to the gathered shoulder style.

name: 'Count the Ways' Dress
description:
Count the ways I love you, dress that can be worn anywhere, any time! 

This playful piece can be worn around 12 different ways to suit the occasion, mood, body shape and fancy, and it is is really simple to work out! The unassuming tie around the neckline can be adjusted to the height that suits and to cover bra straps or be worn without.  

The easiest way to explain how to wear the dress is to look at the pictures. Some multiwear pieces are like rocket science... not this baby. She is simple. Sweet. Comfortable and flattering. Perfect!

BUT, let's count the ways here:
1. Neck line Bow at the front. (Pic no 3)
2. Undo the bow and tie it behind the neck (pic no. 2 and 4)
3. Halter Neck. Turn the whole dress around so the bow is at the back. Cinch the neck in for a sexier look which can be worn with a strapless bra or layered with a top underneath. Spread the neck line out and you can wear this with a bra.

So three easy necklines. Now play with the waist tie.

1. Tie me around your skinny bit. I like to not have two bows at the front for a simple line. So when you have the neck bow at the front, make a bow for the waist tie at the back.
2. Cinch in around your tummy. Look at the waist tie in pic no. 1... do that! It will hide your tummy and look stunning, even if you're up the duff.
3. Cinch me around the back for flatter tummies who want to show off that slimmer line, or hide the bum! Don't think if you do have a tummy that you can't do this, just don't tie too tight.
4. Loose the waist tie altogether! This will allow the dress to fall at an aline, for zero cling and lots of room. 

Three neck lines times four waist ties, makes twelve lovely ways to wear your dress! Add your own belt and you have more ways. Wear over a tee, long sleeve, or singlet. Wear under a cropped jacket or drape cardi. So many possibilities! 

Caurrently available in eggplant (pictured), warm purple grey and timeless black.

One size fits 6-14 due to the aline cut and versatility of straps!

name: Metallic Leggings- Leopard Print
description:
HOT HOT HOT. Wear these with class with a long black tee or singlet to cover the hips and let your legs be all the sexy. 

These look fabulous with wedges, combat boots or sandals in the summer and are a little bit fun. Made with rayon lycra at the back these are so stretchy and forgiving. Fabulous for a night out dancing!

One size fits 8-12

description:

name: 'Tree of Life' Coral Tie Tee
description:
In the little seaside suburb of Altona, along the banks of Cherry Lake, lives a tree. This very tree that can live on you!

Not too deep at the front and not too deep at the back, this tee is sexy, but not too sexy. It is slightly a-line so will fall from the bust to cover any extra little bits you may prefer to not highlight, to put it delicately.
The tie at the top prevents any off the shoulder boulder slippage, and the dipped hem gives a little discretion to the, ahem, rear angle. Wear it with confidence!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14
L-XL fits 14-18

name: Cross My Heart Dress- Jet Black
description:
We nearly named this stunning little piece Boobalicious, because it is! 

A deep cut which can be layered in winter (or summer for that matter) the twist at heart level will draw an empire line across your skinniest bit under the bust and float over your hips and bum.

With tights and boots, long sleeves under and a jacket, here is an elegant way to add a burst of colour to winter.

We only have a few of these left, the RRP was $90, but now we are clearing out!

Available in Dusky Rose, Powder Blue and Classic Black.

S-M fit 8-12
M-L fit 12-14 (I have seen this fit and look amazing on a 16 too!)

name: Green Tube skirt
description:
Made from yummy green rayon lycra this skirt is soft, comfortable and versatile. This skirt is staple of the wardrobe and is will go with everything!

The roll top means you can adjust this skirt to suit any outfit and does not cut in creating muffin top. You can wear unrolled on the hip for maximum length (just below the knee, depending on your height) rolled down for just above the knee or high waisted to team with a crop or simply to keep your tummy pulled in and kidneys warm. You can layer it, or wear it on its own with a simple top.

Due to the roll top this is fantastic maternity wear.

WERE $25, NOW $15! EXCELLENT BARGAIN!!

S-M fits 8-12
M-L fits 12-14

name: Message in a Bottle Necklace- "Why fit in when you were born to stand out?" Dr Suess
description:
These are adorable! Hand made by us from a hardened glass vial and silver chain, our cute little bottles contain messages from some of our favorite philosophers who are most often children's authors like Dr Suess, Winnie The Pooh, Roald Dahl and Alice in Wonderland. 

This little darling reads  "Why fit in when you were born to stand out?"-Dr Suess

The necklace is long, hanging approximately 40cm long and the vial is 3.5cm tall.
